decision_conditions: Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted GLA-01L, GLA-02L,  GLA-03L and GLA-04L  therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 4 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 5 - The development hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes ancillary to the residential use of the dwelling known as 67 Burns Way, Hounslow, London TW5 9BD.
Condition : 6 - Within 3 months of the date of consent the front door shall be removed from the extension and shall be installed in accordance with plan number GLA-04L (received 01/09/2014)
description: Conversion of garage into habitable room including the replacement of the garage door with a window
